title: Episode 279: Troye Sivan

title: Making the Hit! Featuring Grupo Frontera | Latin Music Week 2024
description: Jessica Roiz, Billboard Latin’s Assistant Editor moderates as Grupo Frontera showcases how they make a hit live. How does a top band make a hit?
